description:
Is it a T-Shirt day or a hoodie day? What if it's both? Well then, you're in luck, because our Hooded T-Shirt for men is the perfect solution for those days when you just can't decide.

Part of our bestselling prAna Basics collection, this versatile style is Fair Trade Certified™, meaning the breathably soft organic cotton and the facility it was made in are approved by Fair Trade USA. And with long sleeves and a hood, it gives you a little extra coverage whether pairing with your jeans or your workout gear.
name: Prana prAna Hooded LS T-Shirt - Mens
